name: Emotions
description: Emotions are subjectively perceived mental states brought on by neurophysiological changes, variously associated with thoughts, feelings, behavioural responses, and a degree of pleasure or displeasure

name: Body Metrics
description: Physical measurements like lengths, masses and percentages of the human body

name: Activities
description: Everything regarding movement and engaging muscles like walking time or duration of a workout and Non-physical activities like studying, meditation or reading

name: Locations
description: Through location information, the amount of time spent at the gym, restaurants, doctors, offices, home and work locations can be correlated with Health effects

name: Sleep
description: Sleep is a naturally recurring state of mind and body, characterized by altered consciousness, relatively inhibited sensory activity, reduced muscle activity and inhibition of nearly all voluntary muscles

name: Social Interactions
description: A social relation or social interaction is any relationship between two or more individuals

name: Vital Signs
description: Vital signs include measurements like blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate (or pulse), and temperature

name: Symptoms
description: Symptoms are the perceived or observed effects of diseases and conditions to a human being

name: Nutrition
description: Everything intaken orally for energy, taste and hydration falls into this category, as well as nutrients, diets and nutritional behaviours, but not additional intakes like supplements and medication

name: Outcomes & Goals
description: Outcomes, Health Goals or Goals in general are a description of a desired state of better health or perceived states of a specific symptom to be achievied through interventions

name: Supplements
description: Supplements are orally intaken interventions without medical prescription with the purpose of an effect on health or specific conditions

name: Medications
description: Medications are orally intaken interventions with medical prescription with the purpose of an effect on diseases or specific conditions

name: Therapies
description: Therapies are non orally intaken treatment activities with the purpose of an effect on health, specific diseases or specific conditions

name: Conditions
description: Disease states or conditions that produce various symptoms

name: Environment
description: Influences to the human body and exposures from the outside like local weather conditions, toxic exposure, Noise

name: Digital services
description: Record time spend using specific software, apps or websites. Usage data of electronic devies. Time spent looking at screens or using digital services like Music, TV

name: Body functions & Functional tests
description: Functioning and disablities of the Human body. Functional tests measure a specific function of the human body like grip strength

name: Laboratory tests & Imaging
description: Tests and assays run with biofluids or collected tissue like blood, urine, saliva, stool or through imaging

name: Lifestyle & Life events
description: Health related behaviours and Health related happenings in ones life

name: Phenotypes
description: Classifications of appearances and observations. Optical or biochemical attributes like ethnicity, skin type, blood type

name: Other
description: Last resort for variables that don't fall into any of the available categories
